meaningMnemonic: An <kanji>article</kanji> that proves that you're only <kanji>borrow</kanji>ing money or stuffed animals is called a <vocabulary>loan</vocabulary>. You have to pay that person back for those fluffy critters.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
